meanings.definition: A genus of fungi in the family Mycosphaerellaceae. Many species are plant pathogens.
meanings.english_definition: A genus of fungi in the family Mycosphaerellaceae. Many species are plant pathogens.

examples.sentence: Cercosporella brassicae causes white leaf spot on brassicas.
examples.translation: Cercosporella brassicae はアブラナ科植物に白斑病を引き起こす。

etymology.value: From the genus Cercospora (another fungal genus) + -ella (Latin diminutive suffix).
